definition: whatever/no matter what (who, how etc)/regardless of/not to discuss
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: No matter how carefully I plan my time, the plan always goes wrong.
sentences.chinese: 不论怎么仔细安排时间，我的计划总是出问题。

sentences.english: He told his troubles to every Tom, Dick and Harry.
sentences.chinese: 他见人就诉说自己的烦恼，不论张三，抑或李四。

sentences.english: Free bags, even under other  guises, would be banned.
sentences.chinese: 只要是免费塑料袋，不论以何形式提供都予以禁止。

sentences.english: Cocoa paste, whether or not defatted.
Video recording or reproducing apparatus, whether or not incorporating a video tuner.
sentences.chinese: 视频信号录制或重放设备，不论是否装有高频调谐器。

sentences.english: What ever the accuser said, he could give corresponding refutation.
sentences.chinese: 不论控方说什么，他都能给予相应的驳斥。

sentences.english: No matter prize-winner nationality and sex.
sentences.chinese: 获奖者不论国籍和性别。

sentences.english: So as I face tomorrow with its problems large and small.
sentences.chinese: 故我面临的遭遇，不论大小的难处。

sentences.english: But leaving this physiological view, let us look at the purely educational .
sentences.chinese: 且不论这生理学上的问题，我们单从教育方面来看。

sentences.english: Whatever she tries to launch at you isn't able to penetrate the protective force.
sentences.chinese: 不论她尝试对你做什么，也不能穿透这个保护的力量。

sentences.english: Whether day or night, summer or winter.
sentences.chinese: 不论白天黑夜，炎夏寒冬。

sentences.english: Doctor Liu is on call at all times.
sentences.chinese: 不论什么时候刘医生随叫随到。

sentences.english: I wish you all, wherever you may be, a very happy Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 不论你们现时身在何处，我都祝愿你们圣诞快乐。

sentences.english: It is far away in the country, but always with me,wherever I am.
sentences.chinese: 它虽远在乡下，但不论我身在何方，它都会伴随着我。

sentences.english: And, wherever it's defined, it's curl is zero.
sentences.chinese: 并且不论在哪里定义，旋度都为零。

sentences.english: You may need a good goalies for instance. Take your time however.
sentences.chinese: 比如说不论如何你都需要一个好的门将。

definition: no matter what or how/regardless of whether...
not to be concerned/regardless of/no matter
(reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
